Title: Proto-Fight
Description:
These proto-dragons detest us. They believe we are a twisted version of dragonkind that is manipulated and chained by the Titans. They do not understand.

Which is why they feel safe even as they throw their forces at our walls. 

They are mistaken.

Take this spear, $p. Kill our enemies.
ObjectivesText: Defeat 3 proto-dragons in the Flashfrost Enclave.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Majordomo Selistra at Flashfrost Enclave.
RewardText: They may have been our kin, and perhaps we could have approached them as our brethren... but their cruelty leaves no mercy in my heart.

Objectives.Text: Use the Ruby Harpoon on a proto-dragon
